examMessage:
Final exams are based on the day and time a course is offered. Therefore, if the course schedule changes, then the exam group may also change.

Please note: this calendar is only a guideline for faculty and students to get a sense of when their final exam may take place. The official Schedule of Final Examinations is available the 11th week of instruction.

messages.required:
• Update diploma mailing address and preferred email address on CalCentral
  • Verify your primary name on CalCentral
  • Complete degree requirements: University, Campus, College, Major, and Minor (if applicable)
  • Complete all Incomplete grades required for your degree requirements by the last day of finals for your graduation term
  • Pay outstanding bills (diploma and transcript will be held until paid)
  • Submit final transcripts for any non-UCB work; check instructions for submitting
  • Complete Career Center Destination Survey
messages.studentsWithLoans:
• Complete financial exit interviews (if applicable)
    • Heartland ECSI for students with Perkins/HPSL/Institutional Loan
    • Studentloans.gov for students with Direct Loan
  • Perkins/HPSL/Institutional Loan borrowers should create a Heartland ECSI profile
  • Log into NSLDS to review all of your student loans
messages.recommended:
• Register for Commencement
  • Register for your home college/department graduation ceremony
  • Purchase tickets for graduation ceremony
  • Rent cap and gown
  • Buy announcements
  • Participate in career fairs
  • Join Alumni Association
  • Register to continue using your berkeley.edu email address
